techmeme.title: Google updates Chrome extension policy to ban affiliate link injection without user action or benefit, after allegations Honey stole creators' affiliate revenue (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Cartesia, which is developing real-time generative AI models for voice AI, raised a $64M Series A led by Kleiner Perkins, taking its total funding to $91M (Allie Garfinkle/Fortune)
The Senate approves Gail Slater, President Trump's pick to lead the DOJ's antitrust unit, by a 78-19 vote; she has been critical of power in the tech industry (David McCabe/New York Times)
Sam Altman says OpenAI trained an AI model that is good at creative writing and shares a short story it wrote; he's "not sure yet how/when it will get released" (Sam Altman/@sama)
Mesh raised an $82M Series B, settled mostly in PayPal's PYUSD stablecoin and led by Paradigm, to expand its stablecoin-based payments settlement network (Krisztian Sandor/CoinDesk)
